label: 御修法
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A protective rite to ward off misfortune and promote vital force, and often intended to encourage safe childbirth.  More formally known as Godan Mizuhō, the “Five Altar Rite,” it was performed by five officiants before altars to the deity Fudō and his four directional, protector deities.  In grave cases it could be performed in the palace.[五壇御修法、不動][RK]
